title: Easily Change Your Username on Reddit or Create a New Account

steps.title: Click your avatar or username at the top-right corner of Reddit.
steps.content: Click your avatar or username at the top-right corner of Reddit . If you created your Reddit account with a Google account or Apple ID, you can choose a unique username as long as it's been fewer than 30 days since you created your account. If you're not signed in to Reddit, you'll want to do that first.

steps.title: Click Profile.
steps.content: Click Profile . You'll see this near the top of the menu. If you qualify to change your username, you'll see a pop-up asking if you'd like to change it now.

steps.title: Click Change Username.
steps.content: Click Change Username . You'll only see this option if you're still within the 30-day name change period.

steps.title: Enter a new username and click Continue.
steps.content: Enter a new username and click Continue . Your username can be as few as 3 characters, but no longer than 23 characters. If your username is not already taken and meets the minimum criteria, you'll be asked if you want to keep your new username.

steps.title: Click Save Username to permanently change your username.
steps.content: Click Save Username to permanently change your username. Your changes will take effect right away. Changing your username will not affect your posting history . All your posts, comments, and karma will now be associated with your new username.

steps.title: Tap your profile photo at the top-right corner of the Reddit app.
steps.content: Tap your profile photo at the top-right corner of the Reddit app. If you're using an Android, iPhone, or iPad, you can select a new username in the mobile app.

steps.title: Tap My profile.
steps.content: Tap My profile . It's near the top of the menu. If you created your account with an Apple ID or Google account and it's been 30 days or less since you signed up, you'll see a pop-up window asking if you'd like to choose a new username.

steps.title: Tap Change Username.
steps.content: Tap Change Username . If you don't see this option, you no longer qualify to change your username.

steps.title: Enter a new username and tap Next.
steps.content: Enter a new username and tap Next . Your username can be as few as 3 characters, but no longer than 23 characters. If your username is not already taken and meets the minimum criteria, you'll be asked if you want to keep your new username.

steps.title: Tap Save Username to permanently change your username.
steps.content: Tap Save Username to permanently change your username. Your changes will take effect right away. Changing your username will not affect your posting history . All your posts , comments, and karma will now be associated with your new username.

steps.title: Click your profile photo or username at the top-right corner of Reddit.
steps.content: Click your profile photo or username at the top-right corner of Reddit. If you can't change your username, you can create a new Reddit account easily. But first, you'll need to sign out so you can access the login screen. Reddit doesn't limit how many accounts you can have at once. [2] X Research source Unlike when using the mobile app , you can only sign in to one Reddit account at a time when you're using a computer.

steps.title: Click Log Out.
steps.content: Click Log Out . It's at the bottom of the menu. This takes you back to the Reddit home page.

steps.title: Click Sign Up.
steps.content: Click Sign Up . You'll see this button at the top-right corner. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Follow the on-screen instructions to create your new account.
steps.content: Follow the on-screen instructions to create your new account. If you'd like to sign up using your email address, enter your email address and click Continue . Otherwise, you can click Continue with Google or Continue with Apple to create your new account quickly. [4] X Research source When you create an account with Google or Apple, you'll be assigned a random username to use on Reddit. But don't worry—you'll have 30 days to change it after creating your account . If you have the Reddit mobile app, you can add your new Reddit account in the app. Just tap your profile icon, tap the arrow next to your name, and then tap the logout button to sign out. Then, tap Log in to sign in with your new username.

steps.title: Tap your profile photo at the top-right corner of the Reddit app.
steps.content: Tap your profile photo at the top-right corner of the Reddit app. If you can't change your username, you can create a new Reddit account easily. You can even keep your existing username and switch between accounts in the mobile app—a trick that isn't possible when you're using a computer.

steps.title: Tap the down-arrow next to your username.
steps.content: Tap the down-arrow next to your username. You'll see it at the top of the menu.

steps.title: Choose whether to log out or add a second account.
steps.content: Choose whether to log out or add a second account. The option you select here depends on what you want to do, but both options will still get you to the same place: If you don't plan to use your old Reddit username anymore, you can tap the Log Out icon next to your username, which looks like an arrow pointing right toward a bracket. If you want to stay logged in to your old account in addition to creating a new username, you can stay logged in and tap + Add account at the bottom of the menu.

steps.title: Select an account creation option.
steps.content: Select an account creation option. If you'd like to sign up using your email address, enter your email address and click Continue . Otherwise, you can click Continue with Google or Continue with Apple to create your new account quickly. [5] X Research source If prompted, tap Continue to log in with your Apple or Google account. If your email address is already associated with a Reddit account, tap + Continue creating account when prompted.

steps.title: Follow the on-screen instructions to create your account.
steps.content: Follow the on-screen instructions to create your account. Now you'll go through the Reddit sign-up process, which asks you to select a gender, some interests, and more. If you signed up with your email address, you'll be asked to create a new username. If you signed up with a Google or Apple account, you'll be taken directly to the Reddit homepage once signed in.

steps.title: Change your username (if using a Google or Apple account).
steps.content: Change your username (if using a Google or Apple account). If you just created your new account using your Apple ID or Google username, you can now easily select a custom username instead of the generic one assigned to you: Tap your profile photo at the top-right corner. Tap My profile . Tap Change Username and choose the name you want to use.
